          <identifier>

            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/files/orig/279_2-nukkaa-solmittu.jpg</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/files/orig/279_2-nukkaa-solmittu.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">2 nukkaa solmittu</string>
            <string language="en">2 tuft yarns tied</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">2 Büschelgarne banden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">2 filés de touffe attachés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">2 fios do topete amarraram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">2 filati del trapuntare hanno legato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">2 νήματα τουφών που δένονται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">2 hilados del penacho atados</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Värivalokuvassa esitetään ryijyn aloitus kahden nukkasolmun solmimisen jälkeen</string>
            <string language="en">Colour photograph showing the start of the rya after two tuft knots have been tied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">nukkalanka</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Fotographie, die den Anfang des rya zeigt, 
nachdem zwei Büschelknoten gebunden worden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Photographie de couleur montrant le début du rya 
après que deux noeuds de touffe aient été attachés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fotografia da cor que mostra o começo do rya 
depois que dois nós do topete foram amarrados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fotografia di colore che mostra l'inizio del rya 
dopo che due nodi del trapuntare siano legati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η φωτογραφία χρώματος που εμφανίζει την έναρξη του 
rya μετά από δύο κόμβους τουφών έχει δεθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fotografía del color que muestra el comienzo del 
rya después de que se hayan atado dos nudos del penacho.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
